窮.definition: poor; destitute; to use up; to exhaust; thoroughly; extremely; (coll.) persistently and pointlessly

窮二代.definition: those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s; see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]

窮光蛋.definition: poor wretch; pauper; destitute man; poverty-stricken peasant; penniless good-for-nothing; impecunious vagabond

窮兵黷武.definition: to engage in wars of aggression at will (idiom); militaristic; bellicose

窮則思變.definition: (idiom) when you hit bottom, you have to come up with a new approach

窮匱.definition: to be short of sth; to be wanting in sth

窮在鬧市無人問，富在深山有遠親.pinyin: qióng zài nào shì wú rén wèn ， fù zài shēn shān yǒu yuǎn qīn
窮在鬧市無人問，富在深山有遠親.definition: the poor are ignored in the busiest city; the rich will find relatives in the deepest mountain

窮奢極欲.definition: to indulge in a life of luxury (idiom); extreme extravagance

窮家富路.definition: (idiom) at home be frugal, but when traveling be prepared to spend

窮家薄業.definition: lit. poor and with few means of subsistance (idiom); fig. destitute

窮山惡水.definition: lit. barren hills and wild rivers (idiom); fig. inhospitable natural environment

窮思苦想.definition: to think hard (idiom); to give sth much thought

窮愁.definition: destitute; troubled; penniless and full of care

窮愁潦倒.definition: impoverished and dejected; wretched and penniless

窮抖.definition: to shake uncontrollably; to jiggle (one's leg etc)

窮於應付.definition: to struggle to cope (with a situation); to be at one's wits' end

窮當益堅.definition: poor but ambitious (idiom); hard-pressed but determined; the worse one's position, the harder one must fight back

窮盡.definition: to use up; to exhaust; to probe to the bottom; limit; end

窮竭法.definition: Archimedes' method of exhaustion (an early form of integral calculus)

窮途末路.definition: lit. the path exhausted, the end of the road (idiom); an impasse; in a plight with no way out; things have reached a dead end

窮遊.definition: to travel on a small budget

窮酸.definition: (of a scholar) impoverished, shabby and pedantic; impoverished pedant

窮鼠嚙狸.definition: a desperate rat will bite the fox (idiom); the smallest worm will turn being trodden on
